entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought it online a little over two weeks ago.
Okay, I can definitely help you with that. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see here you purchased a VeloBand Pulse, is that correct?
Yes, that's the one. It's just not what I expected. I want to return it.

I understand. I see the order was placed 15 days ago. Unfortunately, our return window for the VeloBand Pulse and all electronics is 10 days from the date of delivery. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
What?! Ten days? That's ridiculous! I've barely had time to try it out! Are you serious? I want my money back.

I understand your frustration, sir. The return window is outlined in our return policy, which can be found on our website and was also included in your order confirmation email. While a full refund isn't possible at this point, I can look into whether we can offer a store credit as a gesture of goodwill.
Store credit? That's not ideal. I don't even know if I want to buy anything else from you guys now. But fine, what are my options with this 'store credit'?

Let me see what I can do regarding a policy exception. While it's outside of our standard practice, I'm happy to explore options for you. One moment please... Alright, I've spoken with my supervisor and while we can't issue a full refund due to being outside the return window, we can offer you a store credit for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. This credit can be used on any item on our website.
Okay, fine. I guess that's better than nothing. How does that work?

Great. I will email you a unique code that you can enter at checkout to redeem the store credit. It will be valid for one year from today. Just a heads up, the store credit will exclude shipping costs.
Alright, email it to [customer provides email address]. And make sure it works! I don't want any hassles next time.

Absolutely. The email has been sent. Please allow a few minutes for it to arrive. If you have any trouble redeeming it, please don't hesitate to call us back. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thanks for your help.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Have a great day!
